summary: An Ordinance providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades on Sixth Avenue, Seventh Avenue, Eighth Avenue and Ninth Avenue, each from Westlake Avenue to Denny; Lenora Street and Blanchard Street, each from Fifth Avenue to Westlake Avenue; Bell Street, Battery Street, Wall Street and Vine Street, each from Fifth Avenue to Denny Way; Denny Way, from the easterly margin of Fifth Avenue North to Westlake Avenue; Fifth Avenue, from Denny Way to Battery Street; and Taylor Avenue, Sixth Avenue North, Seventh Avenue North, Dexter Avenue and Ninth Avenue North, each from Denny Way to John Street, all in the City of Seattle; and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith.
